modName: Dragonbone Marauder armor  bombshell with tbbp
summary: This adds a full modular set of armor largely inspired by Shockero's Dragonbone Barbarian armor.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i759.photobucket.com/albums/xx237/trumpdog01/2014-06-01_00023_zpsdbdcac96.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

============
important
============

[size=6]When installing the optional files like esps and cbbe meshes with NMM [size=6][b]select NO[/b][/size]when nmm says[/size] [color=#ffff00][size=6][b]"A different version of Dragonbone Marauder armor bombshell with tbbp- Dragonbone Marauder armor plus addon 1.4.1 has been detected.The installed version is 1.4.1,the new versions is 1.4.1.Would you like to upgrade?
Selecting NO will install the New mod normally."[/b][/size][/color]
Click yes when prompted to overwrite existing meshes. I'm sorry about the huge text but i wanted it to be seen easily.

I added 2 optional esp with no hdt highheels requirement for those who dont use high heels.
Files can now be downloaded with NMM and contain all fixes.
The main file contains the 7b tbpp armor with the all upgradeable esp, addon esp, and vanilla world models.
The 2 optional esp contain the all modular pieces converted to clothing and non upgradeable, one with hdt requirement and one without.
The main file esps for the most part are Final, if i add anything else...it will be an update to the addon esp so no more redownloading the main.I apologize for so many needing to redownload the files.I' pretty sure I fixed everything.





This mod was inspired by the dragonbone barbarian armor set and functions the same way.
Adds a craftable,upgradeable, and enchantable set of modular light armor fitted to sevenbase bombshell tbbp with two different looks.
5 sets of boots,2 gauntlets, base armor, bone collar, bone crown and 13 modular pieces.
One set with more forsworn look and the other with more dragonbone look (in terms of textures). Or you can mix them as you see fit.
I would like to thank [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5134496]Shockero[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2684239]skunky123[/url] for allowing me to use some of their assets from their mods.
I used most of the boots and gauntlet meshes from Shockero's Dragonbone barbarian armor and
the forsworn/draugr armor textures from Skunky123's Skyrim Ultra HD Texture Pack

I tried to keep the people who don't like overly skimpy armors in mind so i created a few different options.Although i don't think this was overly skimpy anyway but that's just me=). The base armor is like a bikini as far as skimpy goes.
I did my best with the highheeled versions of 2 sets of boots. Heavy uv editing to atleast get them to look like the default dragonbone boots.
Used the boots from [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22716]UNP Boots 03 by Petrovich[/url] for the foot mesh.

I put a fair amount of effort and time into this to get this to look the way that i wanted it to look
I even went the extra mile and made world models for every piece of armor, although some aren't
perfect and are pretty half assed. (excuse the language...its the only way i could describe them) lol

"Eventually" i would like to convert it to other body types but for now I just want to play for a bit lol.

I hope you like it=)

==========
Installation
==========
1. Extract the meshes, both esp, and texture folders to Skyrim Data folder.
activate the esps

=============
Requirements:
=============
For the cbbe mesh...cbbe compatible textures(obviously)
and the bodyslide version requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]

[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] or XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended by Groovtama ( i can't link the site, google it) for the tbbp animations to work

UNP compatible skin textures

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213]HDT HighHeels System[/url] is needed for the highheels and you WILL cdt on strat up without it.


============
Location:
============
qasmoke instance for those who don't want to craft it.

=========
Crafted under drgonbone and the bone collar is under jewelery
=========

Conflicts:
This mod conflicts with SOS (Schlongs of Skyrim)

=================
Credits and Thanks:
=================

Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity for the sevenbase body
[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992]Sevenbase Body replacer[/url]

Shockero for his awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52711]Dragonbone Barbarian Armors - 7B - UNPB - CBBE[/url] I used some of the meshes.

Skunky123 for the Forsworn and Draugr armor textures [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35507]Skyrim Ultra HD Texture Pack [/url]

Petrovich at [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22716]UNP Boots 03 by Petrovich[/url] for the foot model used for the boots. Open permission given on the front page.

zzjay at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064]KDCirclets Redone by zzjay[/url] for the Headband mesh. Open permission given.

Bethesda soft for making skyrim

Caliente for bodyslide2 and cbbe meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]

Thanks to kofman77 for the cbbe meshes/bodyslide conversions

If i forgot anyone just message me and I will fix it.
